pullRequest.title: 196 modify dep file creation update process
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #196
Objective of this PR is to create/update the dependency file only when the cobol file is in the DID_OPEN sync state.
As part of the review please test it on latest Che 7 (with autosave enabled) and let me know in case of unexpected behavior.
I also updated the changelogs so please check that your contribution is there.

commit.message: Introduce textDocumentSyncType to track the document sync status (opened, changed, closed)
Introduce document sync type with textDocumentSyncType enum

Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/master' into development

implement logic to check the document sync type and disable the dep file creation/update if the text document sync type is DID_CHANGE
update unit test to cover the scenario of different text document sync type DID_OPEN and DID_CHANGE

nodes.bodyText: An extra colon in this line
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3,7 +3,13 @@
 All notable changes to the COBOL Language Support extension are documented in this file.
 
 ## [0.x.x] - TBD
-
+- Modify dep file creation/update process:[#209](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/pull/209) Thanks @[zacanbrcom](https://github.com/zacanbrcom)

nodes.bodyText: To keep the naming convention, it is better to put "Fix copybook extension check"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3,7 +3,13 @@
 All notable changes to the COBOL Language Support extension are documented in this file.
 
 ## [0.x.x] - TBD
-
+- Modify dep file creation/update process:[#209](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/pull/209) Thanks @[zacanbrcom](https://github.com/zacanbrcom)
+- Retrieve settings.json at initialize [#207](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/pull/207) Thanks @[sergiuilie](https://github.com/sergiuilie)
+- Introduce Code Action to Resolve Copybooks [#198](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/pull/198) Thanks @[temanbrcom](https://github.com/temanbrcom)
+- Make CobolVisitor constructor-configurable to simplify DI [#205](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/pull/205) Thanks @[temanbrcom](https://github.com/temanbrcom)
+- Copybook extension check fails [#203](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/pull/203) Thanks @[grianbrcom](https://github.com/grianbrcom)

nodes.bodyText: I think this small refactoring should not appear in the changelog

nodes.bodyText: @sergiuilie wasn't it changed during the last release?
